Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: எல்லார்க்கும் எல்லாம் நிகழ்பவை எஞ்ஞான்றும் வல்லறிதல் வேந்தன் தொழில்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: It is the duty of a king to know quickly (by a spy) what all happens, daily, amongst all men.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A king is shown in his strategy room. He is looking at a magical, living map of his kingdom.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The map is not static; it shows everything happening in real-time. Tiny, detailed scenes depicting all the activities of all his people ('எல்லார்க்கும் எல்லாம் நிகழ்பவை') are constantly updating across the map's surface. This information is being fed to the map by a network of unseen spies.
Layered_Composition.Background: The king's expression is one of deep concentration and understanding. His ability to know everything quickly ('வல்லறிதல்') is shown as the core of his job ('வேந்தன் தொழில்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The fundamental duty of a king is to have a swift and complete awareness of all events concerning all people in his realm at all times.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The magical, real-time map is the central metaphor for a perfect intelligence network. It visually represents the concept of total, immediate information.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The primary light in the dark room comes from the glowing map itself, symbolizing that information is the light by which the king rules. The map glows with a cool, analytical blue light.

Technical_Cues.Camera: An over-the-shoulder shot of the king, allowing the viewer to see the incredible detail on the living map.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with complex and intricate animated details on the map.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Dramatic lighting from the map, illuminating the king's face.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: High-fantasy, with a technological/magical interface aesthetic.

Cultural_Anchors: Knowing all things happening to all people
Kingship as a profession of information gathering.
